name: Soduku-solver
tagline: Code in C++  for soduku matrix solver of 6x6 size.
body:
# Soduku-solver
its a c++ source code for soduku matrix 6x6 solver which accepts digit from 1 to 6. 
it is a source code for built a program which is able to solve soduku matrix of 6x6.the soduku puzzle is given by user and solution is given by our program.
**Linux Users :**
Steps of Using Soduku Solver(linux binary):

STEP 1

![soduku](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/girishkuniyal/soduku-solver/master/screenshot/soduku1.png)

STEP 2

![soduku](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/girishkuniyal/soduku-solver/master/screenshot/soduku2.png)

STEP 1

![soduku](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/girishkuniyal/soduku-solver/master/screenshot/soduku3.png)

**Window users:**
Rules to handle (window) program:
user will give a soduku for solving contains digit from 1 to 6.
the empty space in soduku is represented by 0;
example of 6x6 soduku problem is :

	2	0	1	6	3	4
	0	4	6	2	5	0	
	1	2	5	0	6	3
	4	6	3	5	0	2	
	0	1	4	0	2	6
	6	3	2	1	0	5
	
where 0 represents blank space in soduku.

INSTRUCTION FOR USING SODUKU-SOLVER FOR 6X6 MATRIX

STEP 1

![Soduku Screenshot](http://github.com/girishkuniyal/soduku-solver/blob/master/screenshot/step1.png)

STEP 2

![Soduku Screenshot](http://github.com/girishkuniyal/soduku-solver/blob/master/screenshot/step2.png)

#Download Instruction
Download executable file from bin directory.

Thank you!!
